markdown:
<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Limited">[Sewer Dragon](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=207)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [PFS Quest #10: The Broken Scales](/Sources.aspx?ID=52) pg. 16

 

**Prerequisites**  Kobold  ancestry

</column>

You are one of the Sewer Dragons, born in Absalom's sewers, strengthened by a life defending your territory.

Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Dexterity
or Intelligence, and one is a free attribute boost.

You're trained in the [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) skill, and the [Kobold Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Snare Crafting](/Feats.aspx?ID=843) skill feat.
name: Sewer Dragon
primary_source_raw: PFS Quest #10: The Broken Scales pg. 16

text: Sewer Dragon Source PFS Quest #10: The Broken Scales pg. 16 Prerequisites Kobold ancestry You are one of the Sewer Dragons, born in Absalom's sewers, strengthened by a life defending your territory. Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Dexterity or Intelligence, and one is a free attribute boost. You're trained in the Crafting skill, and the Kobold Lore skill. You gain the Snare Crafting skill feat.
